dct_description_sm: Issued in: Philippi Cluverii introduction in omnem geographiam veterem æque ac novam ... / Johannis Bunonis, curante Johanne Reiskio. -- Lunæburg, MDCXCIV (1694).
With cartouche of draped cloth and branches above; with H. Mosting sculp.; C de Fortunas labelled on California; and a ship to west of California.

California with flat northern coast, and place names Nova Albion, P S Franc[isco] Draco, C de Pinas, C de S Martin, C de Galera, Pueblo de la Cansas. Straet Anian and Anian to north. Great Lakes are missing. Partial outline of Zelandia Nova, Iapan, and Ieso are included. Title cartouche of simple draped cloth with shading behind (top left).
